description:
Our TMDB Plugin for Bubble.io empowers developers to effortlessly integrate TMDB's extensive movie and TV data capabilities into their Bubble.io applications. This plugin simplifies the process of setting up movie and TV data retrieval, ensuring a rich user experience for your web applications.

ðŸ”— Demo Page:  https://chakor-plugin-demo-6.bubbleapps.io/version-test/movie_database



ðŸ”— Editor Link: https://bubble.io/page?id=chakor-plugin-demo-6&test_plugin=1737626030764x654486316281757700_current&tab=Design&name=movie_database&type=page



Our team is available to solve any problems or questions you may have, please open a thread on our support forum: https://forum.thechakor.com/t/plugin-issues
name: Movie Database
plugin_instructions:
Install the plugin
Enter your own API key
Go to "https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api/sessions" and create your own api key
Use the Action or Data Call
Set the parameters such as: query, language, release year, page, region
Display the results in repeating group and use in whatever way you want
